item.description:
Lets get some people together and watch Shawn White in the half pipe and Lindsey Vonn in the downhill compete for medals. This should be one of the best nights for Olympic TV. Come on by my house and watch the olympics. BYOB.
I live close to the center of Union Square in Somerville. If we get a large crowd we may move to "The Precinct" Bar at 10pm, it is a close walk.

Call, text or email to let me know you are coming. May not check the meetup

Tom 617-596-5579
item.how_to_find_us: call me at 617-596-5579 or knock on door, doorbell does not work.
item.name: Olympic Half Pipe and Women's downhill - tonight!
